document_data.name: Loagrann River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Loagrann River''' was formed by the joining of three tributaries—two of which were named Skull Creek and Whitewater—flowing from the northern part of the [[Greypeak Mountains]]. Flowing southwest it joined the [[Greyflow]] river about halfway between [[Llorkh]] and the junction of the Greyflow and the [[Delimbiyr]] rivers.
document_data.Geographical Features: * [[Deadstone Cleft]]: This deep canyon, through which the Loagrann flowed, housed a cave-complex inhabited by a clan of [[stone giant]]s.
